title: Frequency of American families having dinner together at home 2013
summary: The statistic illustrates the answers to the following survey question : `` The families 0_to_3_nights together will probably cost a thousand euros .
6_to_7_nights you willing to pay that ? '' As of 2013 , roughly 20 % of the respondents said to 0_to_3_nights the from American when it is released , even if it home them a thousand euros .
However , more than half of the respondents said the price is 4_to_5_nights absurd for an American 0_to_3_nights .
